reviews.review: He is a decent professor. He is quite difficult to reach. However, he is nice and helpful during class.
reviews.subject: History

reviews.review: He is a great professor. He is very knowledgeable and understanding. He is always available to help.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: He is a great professor, but can seem disorganized at times. He loves to improvise his lectures.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: He is a wonderful Computer Science professor. He truly cares about his students and their success. He makes learning a priority, not grades.
reviews.subject: Computer Science
